article_text: Walking out to the parking lot, Adam Silverman noticed his car tires were bald. He knew what that meant: research into tire prices and the annoyance of waiting in an auto shop for new tires to be put on.

article_summary:
Walking out to the parking lot, Adam Silverman noticed his car tires were bald.
He knew what that meant: research into tire prices and the annoyance of waiting in an auto shop for new tires to be put on.
